name: Fancy-Moodle-Discord-Bot
description: The FMDB notifies you on a discord server about new activities on the Moodle platform.

ADMIN_ID.description: Discord-Id of the initial administrator. More can be added later vie webinterface.

ADMIN_NAME.description: Username of the initial administrator in form of username#0000 .

DISCORD_CHANNEL.description: Id of the channel in discord, where all notification should be published.

DISCORD_TOKEN.description: Token you got from the Discord-Developer-Portal

JWT_EXPIRESIN.description: Defines, how long you will stay logged in at the webinterface.

MONGO_HOST.description: Path to your mongodb instance. Keep the ssl query parameter at the end!

MONGOOSE_DEBUG.description: Activates logging of mongodb queries. Keep it off.

MOODLE_BASE_URL.description: URL of your moodle instance you got from https://fmdb.tjarbo.me

MOODLE_FETCH_INTERVAL.description: Defines how often the fmdb looks for updates. Intervall in milliseconds.

MOODLE_REMINDER_TIME_LEFT.description: If the remaining time of a submission is less than the specified time, a notification will be sind. Time in seconds.

MOODLE_USE_COURSE_SHORTNAME.description: Use the course form or the full course name in Discord messages.

MOODLE_USERID.description: User Id you got from https://fmdb.tjarbo.me .

NODE_ENV.description: Defines the environment, where the bot will be started.
